attributes.action: Should the death penalty be brought back to the UK?
attributes.background: We are doing an Active Citizenship project and answering the question whether the public think the death penalty should be brought back to the UK?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action, but your petition seems to be asking a question. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could also sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/228901
